summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Levva crowdshipping platform. All fixes verified: ObjectId serialization, price_per_kg handling, and chat implementation. Backend 14/14 tests passed, frontend all critical flows working.
critical_code_review_comments: MOCKED: File upload to Cloudflare R2 uses placeholder Unsplash URLs instead of real R2 storage
seed_data_creation: Used existing match ID 6964eedb7b48485f3a36b05d for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All fixes verified working: 1) Match detail page loads without ObjectId errors - nested trip/shipment objects properly exclude _id, 2) Match creation works with price_per_kg=None (defaults to 5.0), 3) Chat fully functional - can send/receive messages. Admin dashboard shows pending verifications with document photos (using Unsplash placeholders). Test user has verification_status=verified.

verified_fixes.objectid_serialization: PASSED - Match details endpoint returns data without _id in nested objects
verified_fixes.price_per_kg_none: PASSED - Match creation works when trip has no price_per_kg (defaults to 5.0)
verified_fixes.chat_implementation: PASSED - Can send and receive messages via /api/chat/{match_id}/messages

frontend_tested_flows: Login flow works for both regular and admin users
Dashboard shows user info, matches, and activities
Match detail page loads without errors (ObjectId fix verified)
Chat displays messages and allows sending new messages
Admin dashboard shows stats and pending verifications with photos
